ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] How do you play this game?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, I remember Pong too... our neighbors had the first one in he area (for those youngsters out there, when Pong first came out, it was in it s own console,
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, I remember Pong too... our neighbors had the first one in he area (for those youngsters out there, when Pong first came out, it was in it's own console, about as big as the original Atari's, but no spot for a cartidge because at that time, there were no other home vidoe games :oP and we thought it was the $#!+ ).

Personally, I use the 1st person view when playing. I may check out other views while running in a wide open area (like the Karana plains) or in an easy fight. I use my keyboard for all movements, and to do most things. I only use the mouse to target people/npcs when I can't use auto-target, and to switch between weapons/instruments.


-=B=-
28th on The Rathe


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
